pr_title: feat(clients/go): add metrics for job worker

timeline.message:
feat(clients/go): add metrics for job worker

Introduces an interface `JobWorkerMetrics` which can be registered with the `JobWorkerBuilder`:
```
builder.Metrics(metricsImpl)
```

feat(clients/go): add metrics for job worker

```

```

timeline.bodyText: Is this testing that the metric is reset to 0 on close?
timeline.author: npepinpe

replies.bodyText: Yes, the test includes also resetting the metric to 0 on close.
replies.author: AndreasBieber
